page.title: 08HOME AND SCHOOL, PRESTON
page.content: I live in a semi-detached house on Woodville Road,Penwortham.In my{family there is my mum, my dad, my brother, my sister and my dog. He is called Jack. He is a Terrier. I go to{Kingsfold}County Primary School each day, from five-to-nine to quarter-past three, and my best friend is in the same class. On Mondays at school, it is my turn to go on the computer and I can pick three more people to use it with me. When I have some{spare time,}I read or watch television, but most of my spare time I spend with my dog. I also like swimming alot. I've only been to the theatre once, with my class. We saw Joseph And His Amazing Techni_ colour Dreamcoat. I have only been to the cinema a few times, but the last time I went I saw 'E.T.'.
